how does one trace their family history a samurai. I am new at this 
and could use a little guidence. when my father was young, (he's 
approaching 70) the japanese consulate gave him 2 samurai dolls as 
he was the eldest son of the eldest son etc. decendant of 2 
different samurai. WWII came and he had to abandon most of his 
posessions including the dolls. He was sent to manzanar. I thought 
it would be nice to trace his history back to to those samurai and 
give the info to him for his 70th birthday. Can anyone help me? His 
fathers name was will kumagai. thanks
